reviews.negative_feedback: The  property needs a lot of maintenance.   The apartment we stayed in was in bad repair and had water leaks in the bathrooms, no toilet paper, only two towels for 5 people (the place could sleep 8 people or more), no air conditioning and the lights outside the apartment door were burned out so we couldn't see how to use the keys to get into the apartment.
reviews.positive_feedback: The apartment building was at the opposite end of the beach from the shops and restaurants, so it was more quiet and not so many people.   It was a nice walk to the restaurants and vendors.  the pool was very nice.   There was a person on duty 24x7 and there is secure parking for your car.  There is also a shower in the parking garage area to rinse off before you go upstairs to your room if you have been to the beach, or before you go to the swimming pool.   The swimming pool area has plenty of shaded seating and is clean and well kept.
